nodes.text: Zoe Whittaker worked as a video assist operator during the additional shooting on both Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones (2002) and Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith (2005). She later worked on Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi (2017) as a video operator for the second unit.

Other film credits include The Wolfman (2010) starring Benicio Del Toro, and Captain America: The First Avenger (2011); both directed by Joe Johnston. In 2004, she worked on the film Closer starring Natalie Portman.
